name: Curve DAO Fee Claim
description: Converts {{token}} into yveCRV and earns a continuous share of [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) fees. Earned [3Crv](https://curve.fi/3pool) (Curve's 3pool LP token) fees can be claimed every Friday.

en.name: Curve DAO Fee Claim
en.description: Converts {{token}} into yveCRV and earns a continuous share of [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) fees. Earned [3Crv](https://curve.fi/3pool) (Curve's 3pool LP token) fees can be claimed every Friday.

es.name: Curve DAO Fee Claim
es.description: Convierte {{token}} en yveCRV y gana una parte continua de las tarifas de [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi). Las tarifas ganadas de [3Crv](https://curve.fi/3pool) (token 3pool LP de Curve) se pueden reclamar todos los viernes.

tr.name: Curve DAO Fee Claim
tr.description: {{token}} tutarını yveCRV'ye dönüştürür ve [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) ücretlerinden sürekli bir pay alır. Kazanılan [3Crv](https://curve.fi/3pool) (Curve'un 3pool LP jetonu) ücretleri her Cuma talep edilebilir.
